dcterms:description: The LIDC dataset contains 1018 CT scans with nodule annotations provided by four expert radiologists in a double-blind fashion, allowing for comprehensive training and validation of lung nodule detection models.
dcterms:title: LIDC (Lung Image Database Consortium)

dcterms:creator: A.A.A. Setio
A. Traverso

B. Geurts
dcterms:description: LUNA is a subset of the LIDC dataset that consists of 888 scans, specifically curated to remove inconsistent cases, providing a refined dataset for evaluating nodule detection algorithms.
dcterms:title: LUNA

dcterms:creator: S.G. Armato III
K. Drukker

K. Farahani
J.S. Kirby
dcterms:description: The LUNGx dataset contains hard malignancy labels for 73 nodules, providing a challenging benchmark for evaluating lung nodule classification algorithms.
dcterms:title: LUNGx
